query.commandtext: SELECT G.FUNC_GRP_ID, COUNT(*) AS VIEW_CNT, ROUND(COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER() * 100 ,2) AS VIEW_PERCENT FROM RWEBFUNLOG L , (SELECT FUNC_GRP_ID,FUNC_GRP_SEQ FROM RWEBGRPFUN GROUP BY FUNC_GRP_ID,FUNC_GRP_SEQ ORDER BY FUNC_GRP_SEQ) G WHERE L.FUNC_GROUP = G.FUNC_GRP_ID AND TO_DATE(L.VIEW_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN TO_DATE(:p_StartDate,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(:p_EndDate,'YYYYMMDD') +1 GROUP BY G.FUNC_GRP_SEQ, G.FUNC_GRP_ID

SELECT FUNC_NAME, COUNT(*) AS VIEW_CNT, ROUND(COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER() * 100,2) AS VIEW_PERCENT FROM RWEBFUNLOG WHERE TO_DATE(VIEW_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN TO_DATE(:p_StartDate,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(:p_EndDate,'YYYYMMDD') +1 AND FUNC_GROUP = :p_Group_ID GROUP BY FUNC_NAME

SELECT G.FUNC_GRP_ID, L. FUNC_NAME , COUNT(*) AS VIEW_CNT, ROUND(COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER() * 100,2) AS VIEW_PERCENT FROM RWEBFUNLOG L , (SELECT FUNC_GRP_ID,FUNC_GRP_SEQ FROM RWEBGRPFUN GROUP BY FUNC_GRP_ID,FUNC_GRP_SEQ ORDER BY FUNC_GRP_SEQ) G WHERE L.FUNC_GROUP = G.FUNC_GRP_ID AND TO_DATE(L.VIEW_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN TO_DATE(:p_StartDate,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(:p_EndDate,'YYYYMMDD') +1 GROUP BY G.FUNC_GRP_SEQ,G.FUNC_GRP_ID,L. FUNC_NAME

query.description: 같은조건의 function 로그가 viewtime이 현재시간 10분 내외로 존재하는지 count -> 10분안에 같은 report를 조회하면 log를 쌓지않음
query.commandtext: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RWEBFUNLOG WHERE FACTORY = :FACTORY AND USER_ID = :USER_ID AND FUNC_NAME = :FUNC_NAME AND FUNC_GROUP = :FUNC_GROUP AND VIEW_TIME BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 10/1440, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 10/1440, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
